version_description: Optimization and bug fixing.
Optimization and bug fixing.

【New Item · Immortal Jellyfish Jar】

Immortal Jellyfish Jar is a route marking item to help you avoid getting lost in the journey.

It will automatically be placed into your backpack after updating and you will need to equip it to the Quick I

Ver1.1.0 update

【Heroic Herald outfit】

The Early purchase reward of the Heroic Herald outfit for Terrence is now available so please talk to the owl in the carriage to put on the outfit!

【Casual Mode】

Casual Mode is for those

1.1.8 version update


【NG+】

After finishing the game, Players can continue from their saved data and start the ‘New Journey’.

After players load their game talk to the Owl in the carriage to start the next part of your journey!

version_name: Update【Updates & Fixes】-Latest DLC ‘Deep into the Dark Mist’ added.-Adjusted the talent effects and values of some characters.-Enhanced Support for 120Hz Refresh Rate on iPad Pro 2018 and above.【Bug Fixes】-Adjusted several unreasonable hit det

1.1.26 Update

【Korean Subtitle Added】

Thanks for the support of Korean players. We added the Korean Subtitle in the latest version and hope the Korean subtitles can bring you a more comfortable game experience.

1.2.3 Version Update

- German, French, Italian, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian subtitles added
- Stability and Performance Updates.

【Updates & Adjustments】
• A New Boss has been added into the Deep into the Dark Mist DLC. Players can face off with this boss after defeating all of the Bosses in the Dark Mist Cave.
• Improved the accumulation efficiency of the Obsession Gauge.

【Updates & Adjustments】
• A New Boss has been added into the Deep into the Dark Mist DLC. Players can face off with this boss after defeating all of the Bosses in the Dark Mist Cave.
• Improved the accumulation efficiency of the Obsession Gauge.

1. DLC "The Tides of Oblivion" is available

2. Enhanced the final Boss of "Into the Dark Mist"

3. Increased a few abilities' damage of Terrence and Norwood

4. Improved game stability

1.5.5 Version Update

1. Fixed a bug which caused Delicate Invitation couldn’t be used in New Journey.

2. Adjustment to the Soul River Water: Now it will also take effect on enemies in battle.

3. Enhanced Terrence, Benita, Norwoo

1.5.5 Version Update

1. Fixed a bug which caused Delicate Invitation couldn’t be used in New Journey.

2. Adjustment to the Soul River Water: Now it will also take effect on enemies in battle.

3. Enhanced Terrence, Benita, Norwoo

1. Added free “Obsession Challenge” mode: race players around the world in defeating bosses in the game

2. Added new content: Viola’s outfit “Initiation Rite” and Benita’s outfit “Sleeping Beauty”

3. Added support for keyboard/mouse cont
